document_data.name: Stormbanner Hold
document_data.mainbody: '''Stormbanner Hold''' was a stronghold near the [[Northlander]] capital of [[Rogarsheim]] on the island of [[Norland]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles|10}}
document_data.Description: Stormbanner Hold was a wooden rectangular structure constructed around some previously existing [[Ffolk]] stone towers.
document_data.Inhabitants: Jarl [[Rault|Rault "the Wise"]] ruled Norland from Stormbanner Hold in the {{YearlinkName|1479}}. Others living within the lodge included the Jarl's family, trusted advisors, and bodyguards.
